definition[0]: one of the 12 pairs of curved bones that surround your chest
example[0]: She was taken to hospital with a broken arm and ribs.
example[1]: He was punched and kicked in the ribs.

definition[2]: a curved piece of wood, metal etc that is used as part of the structure of something such as a boat or building
definition[3]: to make jokes and laugh at someone so that you embarrass them, but in a friendly way
